confirmDialog.name: Name:
confirmDialog.validity: Ce devis est valable jusqu'au {{ expirationTime }}

submit.title: Submit Quote Request {{ code }}?
submit.confirmNote: Are you sure you want to submit this quote request?

cancel.title: Cancel Quote Request {{ code }}?
cancel.confirmNote: Are you sure you want to cancel this quote request?

edit.title: Confirm Edit Quote {{ code }}?
edit.confirmNote: Voulez-vous vraiment modifier ce devis approuvé ?
edit.warningNote: This Quote has been Approved. Editing this Quote will prevent Checkout until new edits are approved.

checkout.title: Checkout Quote {{ code }}?
checkout.confirmNote: Are you sure you want to accept and checkout this quote?

edit.title: Confirm Edit Quote {{ code }}?
edit.confirmNote: Are you sure you want to edit this expired quote?
edit.warningNote: This Quote is expired. Editing this quote will prevent checkout until new edits are approved.

requote.title: Recreate Quote Request {{ code }}?
requote.confirmNote: Are you sure you want to recreate this quote request?
requote.warningNote: This Quote is expired. Re-quoting it will create a new quote request with same contents, which can be edited and submitted for approval afterwards.

submit.title: Submit Quote {{ code }}?
submit.warningNote: Depending on the total value of the quote, an additional approval might be required before the buyer can check out this quote.

approve.title: Approve Quote {{ code }}?
approve.confirmNote: Are you sure you want to approve this quote?

reject.title: Reject Quote {{ code }}?
reject.confirmNote: Are you sure you want to reject this quote?

requote.title: Recreate Quote Request {{ code }}?
requote.confirmNote: Are you sure you want to recreate this quote request?
requote.warningNote: Your current cart will be converted to a saved cart.

edit.title: Edit Quote {{ code }}?
edit.confirmNote: Are you sure you want to edit this quote?
edit.warningNote: Your current cart will be converted to a saved cart.

commons.minRequestInitiationNote: Minimum ${{minValue}} subtotal is required to submit a quote
commons.savedActiveCart: Your active cart was converted to saved cart {{ code }}

httpHandlers.cartValidationIssue: There are problems with your entries. Please review your cart.
httpHandlers.quoteCartIssue: Not possible to do changes to cart entries. Proceed to checkout
httpHandlers.absoluteDiscountIssue: Choose a discount that does not exceed the total value
httpHandlers.expirationDateIssue: Choose an expiration date in the future

threshold.underThresholdError: Total price of requested quote does not meet the minimum threshold

httpHandlers.expired: This quote has expired. You must resubmit your quote request to receive another vendor quote.
httpHandlers.downloadPDFError: Something went wrong. Unable to obtain the proposal document PDF.
